name: Shattered Minds: Encore
summary: As a detective with a knack for strange cases, your Chief has assigned you to a new investigation. After a series of famous monuments vanish into thin air, you are sent to Paris to investigate a possible link between the disappearances and a calling card discovered at the scene. Play through challenging hidden object scenes and perplexing puzzles as you unravel this thrilling mystery. Can you solve the case before anything else disappears?
